rule-22-1-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with a CHW Loop design supply temperature

standard.rule_description: Baseline chilled water design supply temperature shall be modeled at 44F.

rule-22-1-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with a CHW Loop design supply temperature

standard.rule_description: Baseline chilled water design supply temperature shall be modeled at 44F.

rule-22-2-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with a CHW Loop design return temperature

standard.rule_description: For applicable baseline system types 7, 8, 11, 12 and 13, the baseline chilled water design return temperature shall be modeled at 56F.

rule-22-2-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with a CHW Loop design return temperature

standard.rule_description: For applicable baseline system types 7, 8, 11, 12 and 13, the baseline chilled water design return temperature shall be modeled at 56F.

rule-22-3-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 with type 11.1 air-side system and is correctly modeled with a temperature reset type

standard.rule_description: For Baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased cooling, chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset based on outdoor dry-bulb temperature if loop does not serve any Baseline System Type-11.

rule-22-3-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 with type 11.1 air-side system and is incorrectly modeled with a temperature reset type

standard.rule_description: For Baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased cooling, chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset based on outdoor dry-bulb temperature if loop does not serve any Baseline System Type-11.

rule-22-4-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 with type 11.1 air-side system and is correctly modeled with high/low for loop supply temperature reset and loop supply temperature at outdoor high/low

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and does not serve any computer room HVAC systems, chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset using the following schedule: 44F at outdoor dry-bulb temperature of 80F and above, 54F at 60F and below, and ramped linearly between 44F and 54F at temperature between 80F and 60F.

rule-22-4-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 with type 11.1 air-side system  and is incorrectly modeled with high/low for loop supply temperature reset and loop supply temperature at outdoor high/low

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and does not serve any computer room HVAC systems, chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset using the following schedule: 44F at outdoor dry-bulb temperature of 80F and above, 54F at 60F and below, and ramped linearly between 44F and 54F at temperature between 80F and 60F.

rule-22-5-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11.1 air-side system and is correctly modeled with temperature_reset_type

standard.rule_description: For Baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and serves computer room HVAC systems (Baseline   System Type-11), chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset higher based on the HVAC system requiring the most cooling.

rule-22-5-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11.1 air-side system and is incorrectly modeled with temperature_reset_type

standard.rule_description: For Baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and serves computer room HVAC systems (Baseline   System Type-11), chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset higher based on the HVAC system requiring the most cooling.

rule-22-6-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11.1 air-side system and is correctly modeled with loop_supply_temperature_at_low_load

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and serves computer room HVAC systems (System Type-11), The maximum reset chilled-water supply temperature shall be 54F.

rule-22-6-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11.1 air-side system and is incorrectly modeled with loop_supply_temperature_at_low_load

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and serves computer room HVAC systems (System Type-11), The maximum reset chilled-water supply temperature shall be 54F.

rule-22-11-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the pump power per flow rate

standard.rule_description: For Baseline chilled-water system that does not use purchased chilled water, variable-flow secondary pump shall be modeled as 13W/gpm at design conditions.

rule-22-11-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the pump power per flow rate

standard.rule_description: For Baseline chilled-water system that does not use purchased chilled water, variable-flow secondary pump shall be modeled as 13W/gpm at design conditions.

rule-22-14-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the design temperature rise range

standard.rule_description: The baseline heat-rejection device shall have a design temperature rise of 10°F.

rule-22-14-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the design temperature rise range

standard.rule_description: The baseline heat-rejection device shall have a design temperature rise of 10°F.

rule-22-16-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the wet-bulb and approach temperatures

standard.rule_description: Heat Rejection Device Approach calaculated correctly (T/F), Approach = 25.72-(0.24*WB)

rule-22-16-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the wet-bulb and approach temperatures

standard.rule_description: Heat Rejection Device Approach calaculated correctly (T/F), Approach = 25.72-(0.24*WB)

rule-22-19-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the temperature reset type

standard.rule_description: The baseline heat rejection device shall be modeled with variable speed fan control

rule-22-19-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the temperature reset type

standard.rule_description: The baseline heat rejection device shall be modeled with variable speed fan control

rule-22-20-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the minimum reset temperature

standard.rule_description: The baaseline cooling tower shall be controlled to maintain a leaving water temperature, where weather permits, as specified in Table G3.1.3.11

rule-22-20-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the minimum reset temperature

standard.rule_description: The baaseline cooling tower shall be controlled to maintain a leaving water temperature, where weather permits, as specified in Table G3.1.3.11
The baseline condenser loop minimum condenser leaving water temperature shall be modeled as specified in Table G3.1.3.11.
The baseline condenser loop minimum condenser leaving water temperature shall be modeled as specified in Table G3.1.3.11.

rule-22-22-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the chiller rated capacity and full load efficiency

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the type as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load.

rule-22-22-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the full load efficiency

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the type as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load.

rule-22-22-c.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the chiller rated capacity and full load efficiency

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the type as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load.

rule-22-22-d.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the full load efficiency

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the type as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load.

rule-22-23-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the is_chilled_water_pump_interlocked and primary loop pump keys

standard.rule_description: The baseline chiller efficiencies shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels for full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.3.

rule-22-23-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the is_chilled_water_pump_interlocked and primary loop pump keys

standard.rule_description: The baseline chiller efficiencies shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels for full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.3.

rule-22-24-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the child_loop setup and speed_control keys

standard.rule_description: Each baseline chiller shall be modeled with separate chilled water pump interlocked to operate with the associated chiller.

rule-22-24-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the child_loop setup and speed_control keys

standard.rule_description: Each baseline chiller shall be modeled with separate chilled water pump interlocked to operate with the associated chiller.

rule-22-25-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the pump_power_per_flow_rate key

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled-water systems served by chiller(s), the primary pump shall be modeled as constant volume.

rule-22-25-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with the pump_power_per_flow_rate key

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled-water systems served by chiller(s), the primary pump shall be modeled as constant volume.

rule-22-26-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11 and is correctly modeled with the pump_power_per_flow_rate key

standard.rule_description: For chilled-water systems served by chiller(s) and does not serve baseline System-11, the baseline building constant-volume primary pump power shall be modeled as 9 W/gpm.

rule-22-26-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11 and is incorrectly modeled with the pump_power_per_flow_rate key

standard.rule_description: For chilled-water systems served by chiller(s) and does not serve baseline System-11, the baseline building constant-volume primary pump power shall be modeled as 9 W/gpm.

rule-22-27-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11 and is correctly modeled with the is_condenser_water_pump_interlocked key

standard.rule_description: For chilled-water systems served by chiller(s) and serves baseline System-11, the baseline building constant-volume primary pump power shall be modeled as 12 W/gpm.

rule-22-27-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11 and is incorrectly modeled with the is_condenser_water_pump_interlocked key

standard.rule_description: For chilled-water systems served by chiller(s) and serves baseline System-11, the baseline building constant-volume primary pump power shall be modeled as 12 W/gpm.

rule-22-29-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11 and is correctly modeled with the pump_power_per_flow_rate key

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design condenser-water pump shall be modeled as constant volume.

rule-22-29-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 11 and is incorrectly modeled with the pump_power_per_flow_rate key

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design condenser-water pump shall be modeled as constant volume.
